metadata.description: True Patriot, the anthology of Canadian superheroes, returns as a DIGITAL FIRST, bi-monthly series! Fan-favourites like Arrowhead by Jay Stephens, Family Dynamic by J. Torres & Tim Levins, and Red Ensign by Scott Chantler return alongside new features including Crude by Fred Kennedy & David Bishop, Fantome by Meaghan Carter, and much more.
metadata.name: True Patriot Presents
